You are eligible for a refund only if you meet any one of the conditions:

✔The lawyer you paid to chat with didn't reply or his counselling wasn't helpful

✔The lawyer you had an appointment with cancelled it or didn't show up at the office

✔The lawyer you appointed to visit your location didn't show up

✔Your appointment wasn't booked after successful transaction

✔Lawyer wasn't added to your chatlist after successful transaction
